segments.text: I'm watching the two children with a mix of amusement and apprehension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced on that rickety stool, stretching his little arm out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable; I can almost see it wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, a perfect accomplice, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so eager, almost bouncing with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They clearly think they're being very stealthy, but it's all so obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The 'COOKIE JAR' label is practically yelling their secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't fall and hurt themselves for a few treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for a loud crash and scattered cookies is high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, full of innocent daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their concentration on the cookies is quite admirable, honestly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely oblivious to the rising water near the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR
